name: infra-dev
onCreateCommand: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get install -y make shellcheck bats pre-commit; if ! command -v gitleaks >/dev/null 2>&1; then curl -sSfL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/gitleaks/gitleaks/master/install.sh | sudo sh -s -- -b /usr/local/bin; fi; sudo apt-get clean'
